Name: Gaze Into Fate
About the game: The wilds are scarred by the endless cycle of war. It’s time for a change. In a world that has always been the way it is, Tiiyao, a shaman and tribal leader, searches for knowledge and answers. Communicate with your ancestors and experience an intense story in this approximately 60 minute game experience that will also make you search for answers. Why does the cycle of war never ends? Which is the right path? What is your fate in this world? Do we even have a choice? Immerse yourself in a primeval, shattered world and find your so needed answers. ‚Gaze Into Fate‘ is a meditative and story-driven puzzle game, where you have to find your place in a world of endless wars. Can you make a change? 50+ challenging puzzels, a fully voiced story line and highly polished visuals and sounds are making this game to a special game experience. An exciting story with a serious background Set in a mystical & primal world 50+ challenging but never frustrating puzzles fully voiced characters highly polished, hand drawn visuals coherent soundtracks and sound effects 100% free to play About the developer For us, this is our very first game we ever created as a team. We are so proud of what we accomplished and it’s definitely just the beginning of our journey. Please follow us on social media if you want to be part of our community as a supporter.
